name: Entrenched
description:
I am a game design student, and this is my university project I made. I have no plan to commercialize it but I decided to release it for you guys to try out for free!

ENTRENCHED is a 2D side-scrolling shooter game set in WW1 era. You are a surviving soldier fighting against hordes of zombies.

The game is in the development stage. It is an experimental project for me to try out some coding and scripts to create a shooter game in Unity. It features an immersive weapon handling system I made on my own.

The weapon handling system features a custom amount of aiming sway radius, speed, recoil, and weapon manipulations and mechanics for each weapon (automatic handgun having slide lock back when firing last round, etc.)

Feel free to give comments or share some interesting thoughts or have a look at the source code if you are making games on Unity, but don't expect the game to be finished anytime soon. *finger crossed*

I hope you enjoy it! HAVE FUN!

---CONTROLS---

AD - Move

LEFT MOUSE - Melee, Fire (When Aiming)

RIGHT MOUSE - Aim (HOLD)

R - Reload

ALPHA NUMBERS: Select Weapon

1: Rifle (LEE-ENFIELD)

2: Handgun (M1911)

3: Shotgun (M1897 Trench Gun)

4: Machine Gun (M1918 BAR)

--CHEATS--

BACKSPACE - Restart

**The current state of the game has no sound yet**
